CustomField.formula: IF( DMAPP__Is_Complete__c , $Label.dmapp__tandi_completed, IF( !ISBLANK(DMAPP__Start_Time__c) && ISBLANK(DMAPP__End_Time__c) , $Label.dmapp__tandi_started, IF( DMAPP__Effective_Date__c < BLANKVALUE($Setup.DMAPP__Dealmaker_Core_Settings__c.DMAPP__Mock_Today__c, TODAY()), $Label.dmapp__tandi_overdue, IF( ISNULL( DMAPP__Reschedule_Date__c )|| ISNULL(DMAPP__Original_Schedule_Date__c) && NOT(ISNULL(DMAPP__Reschedule_Date__c)), $Label.dmapp__tandi_scheduled, IF( DMAPP__Reschedule_Date__c <= DMAPP__Original_Schedule_Date__c, $Label.dmapp__tandi_rescheduled, $Label.dmapp__tandi_deferred ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status Label
